News01

Whitepaper

Forsa is a global, public open-sourse platform for building decentalized infrastructure of borderless economy based on uniqe blockchain.

On Forsa you can: create your own blockchains, decentralized applications (DApps), web-services, tokens and use fastest PoW network infrastructure in the world to deliver any digital values.

The technical core allows you to create solutions on JavaScript smart-contracts for DAOs, DeFi, Games, Votings, Payments, BaaS and so on

On Forsa you can: create your own blockchains, decentralized applications (DApps), web-services, tokens and use fastest PoW network infrastructure in the world to deliver any digital values.

The technical core allows you to create solutions on JavaScript smart-contracts for DAOs, DeFi, Games, Votings, Payments, BaaS and so on

New life of PoW consensus

Forsa is a global, public open-sourse platform for building decentalized infrastructure of borderless economy based on uniqe blockchain.

Tera Network04
Forsa is a first shard of TERA Network

Tera Network is an association of independent blockchains working in a common hash. Each new blockchain speeds up the network at times.

Create your own blockchain and become part of a universal blockchain network!

Blockchain
Blockchain
Blockchain
Blockchain
TERA
Blockchain
Blockchain
Blockchain
Tera Network

commonhash

Features of FORSA
Advantages05
New era of
decentralization

Now decentralization is achieved not only by the equality of an unlimited number of nodes, but also by the equality of blockchains within a single network, with cross-blockchain transactions.

Fast as light

Brand new network Protocol, in a new way organizing and structuring the communication of nodes among themselves as well as rethinking the architecture of data transmission within the blockchain.

Ready for mass
adoption

All DApss are stored on blockchain and are easily accessible to anyone on the web. Without commissions for transactions sending valuables and information is available as never before.

Gathered all previous blockchain features

Protection from Double Spending and DDoS attacks, Attack- and censorship-resistant, creating tokens and smart-contracts, hight performance, true distributed network and data storage and more.

Development of DApps

Everyone who knows Java Script can easily create their own smart contract and join to blockchain technology.

Easy Mining

Anyone can become a full node and start mining. The application is completely free and easy to install. It is not necessary to download the entire blockchain.

Tera Network06
DApp IDE Grants for developers DApp paper Api Coming soon
New limitless possibilities
for developers

We are on the way to creating web 3.0. On the way to creating a truly borderless economy. Our main philosophy is to create the best conditions for developers who believe in the future of a truly decentralized free democratic Internet.

We are on the way to creating web 3.0. On the way to creating a truly borderless economy. Our main philosophy is to create the best conditions for developers who believe in the future of a truly decentralized free democratic Internet.
